column4: Copter don't repeat so often. Are you including the word 'shell'
Copter start typing everything from 'mysql' and avoid the shell> stuff..
and try it again.
Copter did it work
Why can't I even see anything on screen?
japanese?
I just had some IRC errors. (sorry) I have modified the smb.conf file as you instructed me.
Ok . Now restart your samba by doing 'sudo invoke-rc.d samba restart'
wait. before that. do 'sudo smbpasswd -a username' where username is the user for which the home directory you want to share. then do the restart command.
OK
I would suggest you give the same password as the regular user password.
ok, added the user and restarted samba
ok now try accessing it from your mac miaachine?

I am not sure this is Mac OS X or Ubuntu, but I get the following (different from before) message: "The operation cannot be completed because one or more required items cannot be found. (Error code -43)."
where do you get that error message?
on mac or on Ubuntu?
mac
if it is on mac, I am guesing you will have to install something on mac before you can access the file.I will have to search google for that.
in Windows that is what you are required to do ... so I am not pretty sure ...

harisund: well, if you would like to, go ahead, but i will search around some more and see if i can find someone who is more familiar with doing this on a mac. don't worry about it. thanks for your help
ok.. sorry ... but atlesat, it looks like you have all required packages on Ubuntu. Good luck!
actually, it just worked, but i didn't do anything different except connected to smb://<ip> instead of smb://<ip>/<share folder>
thank you again for your help
